EmailTemplate.name: New Amission Discharge Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Admission has been Discharged
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This is an automatically generated message from our ESD system.
Hello {!Admission__c.LastModifiedBy},
An admission for {!Admission__c.Person_Being_Served__c} has been discharged. Here is the link to the admission in Salesforce.com: {!Admission__c.Link}
Please also update the corresponding records in your Billing System.
Thank you.
